text:
Hi! Can CRM cards be included as part of a HubSpot App offer? 
Another way to ask this would be: 
when you install a HubSpot App on your account, lets say ACME HubSpot app, Is it possible for Acme to have had included a CRM card development as part of their integration offer?
If a CRM card is defined in the public app, you have to render that card, it’s not optional.
Thanks <@U037QED9TR6> . Ahh great! So CRM cards ARE included in the public app builder options

Yes definitely, HubSpot likes to see CRM cards and workflow actions in public apps. These are viewed as positive by the Solutions Engineers and CSMs. They believe it shows deeper integration, better leveraging of the HubSpot platform and creates more value for the customer. 
More to come too when HubSpot releases UI Extensions in Public apps. (No official announcements on that. My words not HubSpot’s) :)
